data.name: Bembien
data.title: Looking for a Co-Marketing campaign partnership
data.description: Handmade Basket Bags from natural materials by talented artisans from around the world. 10% of Bembien’s proceeds go to Nest, a nonprofit committed to the social and economic advancement of artisans
notes: Willing to give products, Social contest, Open for new ideas

data.name: Patagonia
data.title: Looking for a Business Development partnership
data.description: Patagonia is an outdoor apparel company based in Ventura, California. A certified B-Corporation, Patagonia’s mission is to build the best product, cause no unnecessary harm and use its business to inspire and implement solutions to the environmental crisis.
notes: Patagonia is looking to expand the business to new fields and promote Cross media campaigns with a fresh young brand.

data.name: Lush Cosmetics
data.title: Looking for a Co-Marketing campaign partnership
data.description: Lush Cosmetics is an all-natural bathbody brand. We make everything from shampoos and fragrances to massage bars and bath bombs. In addition to making the world more beautiful, one person at a time, Lush is dedicated to eco-friendly products and practices.
notes: Offering brand partnership - Producing a video/ Social contest

data.name: Influential
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Kenya-born and Brooklyn-based artist Wangechi Mutu creates performance, video, sculptures, and other works of art. The top art influencer’s Instagram feed features work by her and others. She has 31K followers.
notes: Professional ֿartist Influencer is looking for the next opportunity: Willing to paint and design different products lines to get exposure to her art.

data.name: Corona Extra + Parley
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Corona Extra is The best Mexican beer in the world. Parley is an organization and collaboration network that raises awareness for the beauty and fragility of the oceans. With Corona‘s passion for beach, surf and ocean culture, and Parley‘s collaborative, eco-innovative approach to solutions, we are teaming up for the Oceans, to protect 100 islands from plastic pollution by 2020.

data.name: Netflix
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Netflix is the world's leading internet entertainment service with more than 130 million memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, documentaries and feature films across a wide variety of genres and languages
notes: Looking for brand partnerships that can give added value to Netflix’s Audience, for the upcoming Netflix’s Media events. Partners will have full exposure at the events and cross promotion.

data.name: Viral Nation
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Devin Graham, or known as devinsupertramp, is a videographer who producers adventure and extreme sport videos on YouTube for social media platforms
notes: Devin is looking to create extreme sport videos for sport and combine product endorsement

data.name: Jango
data.title: Looking for a Business Development partnership
data.description: Jango is a free custom radio that plays your favorite music. Jango is all about making online music easy and fun - a free online music streaming service that allows you to create custom radio stations.
notes: Jango is about to launch a new music gaming add-on feature to our app. We are looking for a strategic partner either from the gaming, music or any other relevant field, to team-up with.

data.name: Woodies
data.title: Looking for a Co-Marketing Campaign Partnership
data.description: Woodies Bamboo Sunglasses: The combination of natural materials, handmade construction, and a connection to the wholesome fashion of the 1950's
notes: Woodies is launching a new product line - Wood and bamboo designed Watches and a new matching Sunglasses collection. We are looking for a co-marketing partner to create a cool fashion campaign, promoted in Social media platforms

data.name: Planet Fitness
data.title: Looking for Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Planet Fitness, one of the largest and fastest growing franchisors and operators of fitness centers in the U.S, with more than 1,500 locations in 50 states, is taking the fitness industry by storm! We've revolutionized the industry with our combination of affordable prices, great value and non-intimidating Judgement Free Zone®. Planet Fitness' mission is to enhance people's lives by providing a high-quality fitness experience
notes: Planet Fitness is running a serial of ‘Open Club’ - Music and Fitness events in more than 500 clubs, across 50 states. We invite brands to join our awesome events from sport/music/bar or related industries

data.name: Virgin Trains
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Born in ’97, we’ve been putting trains on the West Coast of UK Main Line tracks for more than 20 years now. Running up to a vision-blurring 125mph with free onboard entertainment, a proper walk-in shop and comfy seats; we make journeys memorable
notes: Virgin Trains operates free onboard entertainment in our trains. We are looking to generate value with our entertainment system by partnerships with Music/ Media/ Content providers brand

data.name: Greenpeace
data.title: Looking for Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Greenpeace is a global, independent campaigning organization that uses peaceful protest and creative communication to expose global environmental problems and promote solutions that are essential to a green and peaceful future
notes: Greenpeace’s ‘Be apart’ Global campaign is about creating creative communication with companies and influencers around the globe to contribute to Greenpeace protest and Go-Green as a company and individuals. Join us to our partners program.  It’s a win-win situation for everybody

data.name: Yoga Now
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Yoga Now provides inspiring, soulful transformation through yoga classes and massages in an eco-friendly studio and in the workplace. We are committed to providing yoga and healing which creates a healthy body and promotes a long and peaceful life.
notes: Yoga Now is running serial events and workshops program throughout the year. We are looking for relevant event sponsor for long-term partnership

data.name: Green Fitness Studio
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Green Fitness is a Full Service studio – everything you need in one place to feel great and look great. Personal training, nutritional coaching, massage and spa treatments. Green Fitness Studio is the first eco friendly fitness center. We constantly challenge ourselves to make our studio more eco friendly and energy efficient.
notes: Green Fitness Studio is proud to be the first eco-friendly fitness center, we are looking to reshape the brand to be a fun- experience venue. If you consider your brand as cool and fun and you believe you can contribute value to our members, partner with us and you will have full exposure, media promotion, and Distribution point to your Product.

data.name: SoundCloud
data.title: Looking for a Co-Marketing Campaign partnership
data.description: SoundCloud is the world’s leading social sound platform where anyone can create sounds and share them everywhere. Recording and uploading sounds to SoundCloud lets people easily share them privately with their friends or publicly to blogs, sites and social networks
notes: SoundCloud Expands “First On SoundCloud” Campaign to the U.K. and Germany. Campaign features artists from both countries who started their careers on SoundCloud. We are looking for a brand to team up for the promotion of this awesome campaign. Brands and creators will get promoted across SoundCloud playlists, social mentions, newsletters and blog, out of home advertising, plus fast track consideration for monetization in SoundCloud’s Premier and partnership opportunities

data.name: Billabong
data.title: Looking for a Strategic Partnerships
data.description: Surf company, primarily a clothing retailer that also produces accessories; watches, backpacks, skateboard and snowboard products
notes: Billabong is looking for brands sponsorship for the annual World Surf competition in Hawaii
